original_title: Three killed, two injured in hit-and-run in Anuradhapura
original_body_lines: Three men were killed and two women were injured by a hit-and-run driver in Rambewa, Anuradhapura early this morning (March 09), the police said.
The speeding vehicle, which had been returning from a musical show, had fled the scene after knocking down the pedestrians.
Two women who were injured in the accident are currently being treated at the Anuradhapura Teaching Hospital.
